definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: slaughter for sacrifice (NH id., Ph. [[זבח]]; As. Zibû Dl:Pr 174 cf. Lotz:TP 174; Ar. d-abah.a, Sab. [[דַבח]] CIS:iv. 1, 2, No. 74 l. 11. 12; Aram. [[דְּבַח]], dbah., Eth. )

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: victims, (a) animals † [[בָּקָר וׇחאׁן]] 1Ki 8:63, Nu 22:40, † [[חאן ובקר]] 2Ch 18:2, † [[הַבְּרִיאָה]] Ez Eze 34:3, † [[כָּל־פֶּטֶר רֶחֶם]] Ex 13:15 (J); † [[פָּרִים וְאֵילִים]] 1Ch 15:26, [[שׁוֹר וׇשֶׂה]] De 17:1; (b) mankind † [[בָּנִים וּבָנוֹת]] Ps 106:37, Ez Eze 16:20, † [[זׁבְחֵי אָדָם]] sacrificers of mankind Ho 13:2 (so Ra AE Hi Wü MV; men that sacrifice AV RV after Ki, so Pu Ew Ke Now Che SS).

c. [[לְ]] of deity, † [[לְדָגוֹן]] Ju Jdg 16:23, † [[לַשְּׂעִירִם]] Le 17:7 (H), † [[לַשֵּׁדִים]] De 32:17, Ps 106:37; other gods Ex 34:15 (JE) +; but usually [[ליהוה]] Ex 3:18 + 9 t. JE, Le 17:5, Le 19:5, Le 22:29 (all H, not elsewh. in P), De 15:21, De 16:2, De 17:1, 1Sa 1:3 +; † [[לֵאלֽהֵי]] [[אָבִיו]] Ge 46:1 (E), [[לאלהים]] Ps 50:14, † [[לאדני]] Mal 1:14.
with local prep. [[בְּ]] Ge 31:54 (E) +, [[עַל]] Ex 20:24 (E) +; [[לפני]] Le 9:4 (P) +, [[על פני השׂדה]] Le 17:5 (H).

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: slaughter for eating (connected also with sacrifice, as all eating of flesh among ancient Hebrews was sacrificial, RS:Sem. 219) 1Sa 28:24 (fat calf for Saul), Ez Eze 34:3 (fat sheep for shepherds), 2Ch 18:2 (sheep and oxen for Jehoshaphat, c. [[לְ]] of person); cf. De 12:15, v:De 12:21 (abs.), 1Ki 19:21.

definitions.title: III.
definitions.body: slaughter in divine judgment Ez Eze 39:17-19 c. acc. [[זִבְחִי]] (Gog and Magog as feast for vultures), 1Ki 13:2, 2Ki 23:20 (priests of high-places on their own altars). †
of the abundant sacrifices made to Yahweh by Solomon 1Ki 8:5 = 2Ch 5:6, and Hezekiah 2Ch 30:22, and prob. intensive; but

elsewhere of sacrifice to other deities, possibly iterative in some cases, but certainly not in all: [[לַבְּעָלִים]] Ho 11:2, [[לֵאלֽהֵיהֶן]] 1Ki 11:8, [[לַעֲגׇלִים]] 1Ki 12:32, [[לְחֶרְמוֹ]] Hb Hab 1:16, [[לַעֲחַבֵּי כְנׇ֑עַן]] Ps 106:38, [[לֵאלֽתֵי דַּרְמֶשֶׂק]] 2Ch 28:23, [[לְכָל־הַפְּסִילִים]] 2Ch 33:22; or in unlawful places [[עַל־רָאשֵׁי הֶהָרִים]] Ho 4:13 cf. v:Ho 4:14, [[בַּגִּלְגׇּל]] Ho 12:12, [[בַּבָּמוֹת]] 1Ki 3:2, 1Ki 3:3, 1Ki 22:44, 2Ki 12:4, 2Ki 14:4, 2Ki 15:4, 2Ki 15:35, 2Ki 16:4 = 2Ch 28:4. It is used without direct obj. Ho 4:14 and oft.; also c. acc. of victim [[שְׁוׇרִים]] Ho 12:12 [[חאׁן וּבָקָר]] 1Ki 8:5 = 2Ch 5:6; sons and daughters Ps 106:38, [[זִבְחֵי שְׁלָמִים]] 2Ch 30:22.
